snippet.title: The Gray Man - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2216860/The_Gray_Man/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheGrayManGame

The Gray Man is a surreal first-person point-and-click adventure. It tells the story of a serial killer who constantly confronts the player with interpretations of his internal conflict. The player is thus reincarnated as the murderer's conscience, attempting to manipulate the main character so that he does not continue his horrific deeds.
